author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Finish Line Sees Q4 Adjusted EPS $0.58 To $0.59 From Cont Ops
text: March 26, 2018 / 6:27 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Finish Line Sees Q4 Adjusted EPS $0.58 To $0.59 From Cont Ops Reuters Staff March 26 (Reuters) - Finish Line Inc: * FINISH LINE ANNOUNCES PRELIMINARY FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2018 RESULTS * SEES Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.39 TO $0.40 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * SEES FY GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.35 TO $0.36 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 SALES $561.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $577.5 MILLION * Q4 SAME STORE SALES FELL 7.9 PERCENT * SEES Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.58 TO $0.59 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS EXCLUDING ITEMS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
